metadata.name: Troubleshooting Pack Cmdlet Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "TroubleshootingPack" cmdlets to leverage CVE-2022-30190 or action similar to "msdt" lolbin (as described in LOLBAS)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke-troubleshootingpack')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\diagnostics\\\\system\\\\pcw')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-answerfile')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('-unattended')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "TroubleshootingPack" cmdlets to leverage CVE-2022-30190 or action similar to "msdt" lolbin (as described in LOLBAS)

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate usage of "TroubleshootingPack" cmdlet for troubleshooting purposes References: https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1537919885031772161, https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/Binaries/Msdt/
